policy_non_nuclear_waste: Near-surface disposal of VLLW and LLW at El Cabril.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier or managed by ENRESA through storage and disposal routes.
policy_nfc_waste: VLLW/LLW to El Cabril; higher-activity waste and SF to centralized storage then DGR.
policy_spent_fuel: Interim storage for around 60 years before geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: All RW and SF management and decommissioning of nuclear facilities.
funding_rwm: Producers pay contributions through electricity tariffs and specific fees.
funding_sf_hlw: Same national fund; contributions from nuclear operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed from the same fund.
reactors_note: Fleet of PWR and BWR units in operation; one reactor under decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW disposed at the national LLWR and Dounreay; VLLW may go to conventional landfills.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier or managed through national waste routes.
policy_nfc_waste: Higher activity waste to be disposed in a geological disposal facility; LLW via near-surface facilities.
policy_spent_fuel: SF from AGR and PWR reactors expected to be disposed in a geological disposal facility after storage.
wmo_responsibilities: Strategic management of historic and public sector RW and SF liabilities.
funding_rwm: Government funding for NDA estate; producers pay for non-NDA sites.
funding_sf_hlw: Combination of government funding and contributions from operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funds for commercial reactors; government for legacy sites.
reactors_note: AGR fleet plus one PWR; two EPR units under construction at Hinkley Point C.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Institutional waste and LLW disposed in near-surface facilities where appropriate.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier if feasible, otherwise storage and disposal in national facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: Existing LLW repository and planned facilities for long-lived ILW and geological disposal.
policy_spent_fuel: Direct disposal of spent fuel in a deep geological repository at Forsmark (KBS-3).
wmo_responsibilities: Development and operation of SF and RW storage and disposal facilities.
funding_rwm: Nuclear Waste Fund financed by fees on nuclear electricity generation.
funding_sf_hlw: Same Nuclear Waste Fund for SF/HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning costs covered via the same fund.
reactors_note: Six reactors in operation at Forsmark, Oskarshamn and Ringhals.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Near-surface storage/disposal for institutional radioactive waste.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier where possible, otherwise centralized storage and conditioning.
policy_nfc_waste: Centralized storage at NPP site and future disposal facility.
policy_spent_fuel: Long-term storage of spent fuel at Akkuyu NPP site; geological disposal option under development.
wmo_responsibilities: National coordination of radioactive waste management and disposal projects.
funding_rwm: Producers pay contributions to a radioactive waste management account.
funding_sf_hlw: Fees on nuclear electricity to a spent fuel and HLW fund.
funding_decom: Separate decommissioning fund financed by operators.
reactors_note: Four VVER-1200 units under construction at Akkuyu NPP.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW disposed in regional near-surface facilities; ILW disposal routes vary by state/compact.
policy_disused_sources: Return to manufacturer where possible; otherwise storage, reuse, recycle or disposal.
policy_nfc_waste: LLW via near-surface disposal; HLW intended for disposal in a geological repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Wet and dry storage at reactor sites and ISFSIs with long-term geological disposal as policy.
wmo_responsibilities: Management of DOE-owned RW and SF and development of federal disposal solutions; LLW for commercial waste via state/compact system.
wmo_ownership: State / federal agencies and state compacts
funding_rwm: Producers and government funding depending on waste origin.
funding_sf_hlw: Nuclear Waste Fund financed by fees on nuclear electricity (collections suspended).
funding_decom: Decommissioning trust funds regulated by NRC; public sector sites funded by the federal budget.
reactors_note: Large LWR fleet with many units permanently shut down and in various stages of decommissioning.
